casebody.data:
James P. ARLOTTA, petitioner,
v.
BANK OF AMERICA, N.A., et al.; James P. Arlotta, petitioner,
v.
Diocese of Buffalo, et al. No. 17-9078. Supreme Court of the United States Oct. 1, 2018.

Petition for writ of certiorari to the United States Court of Appeals for the Second Circuit denied.
